Posts.Content: Thankyou everyone for your advice it's been really helpful. I've finally got my appointment through to see my doctor and get my treatment plan confirmed so should be starting my chemo at the end of the month x

Posts.Title: Just been diagnosed

Posts.Content: hi everyone. I'm 32 and have just been diagnosed with breast cancer. It has also spread to my lymph nodes so I will shortly be starting my chemo. Was just wondering if anyone has any tips or advice as to how to best cope thanks
Posts.Title: Just been diagnosed

Posts.Content: That's brilliant thank you Lindsey ill have a look now. I think I'm going to need all the help I can get as I have a 4 year old and 6 month old twins so the next year or so will be interesting x
